# linux-ufw
[[linux]]

- 查詢狀態
```bash
sudo ufw status
```

- 查詢rules

```bash
sudo ufw status numbered
```

- 刪除rules
```bash
sudo ufw delete <num>
```

- 新增 規則
```bash
sudo ufw allow http
sudo ufw allow https
sudo ufw allow out 1433
```

[//begin]: # "Autogenerated link references for markdown compatibility"
[linux]: linux.md "Linux"
[//end]: # "Autogenerated link references"
